system

Class FidelityCardPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • system.FidelityCardPoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FidelityCard

    public class FidelityCardPoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements FidelityCard, java.io.Serializable
    This fidelity card plan has a coefficient of 1 or 1-discount: this is determined by the discounts points that are obtained each time the customer places an order. When the customer reaches a concrete amount of points (by default 100) a determined discount is applied to the next order (by default 10%) and the points are then removed from the customer.
    Author:
    Juan Castillo (programer), Pedro León (tester)
    See Also:
